channel.title: Comments on: high speed mobile meshing
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: m u l · t i · p l i c · i · t y
item.dc:creator: m u l · t i · p l i c · i · t y
item.description:
<strong>The wireless Mesh caravn revisited</strong>
c o d e r l o g I recently wrote about the WiFi Caravan; an attempt at maintaining a wireless mesh network while driving through the US. this article on coderlog, is all about what went wrong.... this one, is more of a general description of how it all...
item.content:encoded:
The wireless Mesh caravn revisited

c o d e r l o g I recently wrote about the WiFi Caravan; an attempt at maintaining a wireless mesh network while driving through the US. this article on coderlog, is all about what went wrong…. this one, is more of a general description of how it all…
